name: Adventures with Fido
description:
"You are a Corgi in a sunny backyard."

A simple premise becomes a world of opportunity in the paws of your protagonist. Explore your humble beginnings, and unlock worlds of wonder and intrigue as you complete quests, achieve objectives, earn currency, and build friendships. From a trip to the clouds to a haunted mansion to an underground kingdom, how much can a Corgi like you really get up to while exploring a backyard?

Includes:

  • Quests
  • Exploration Zones
  • Mini-games
  • Achievements
  • Open World
  • Item Management

As of now, the game is completely playable and complete with ending scene. More content may come in the future in the form of new zones, quests, achievements, and expanded content in current mini-games.

However, the main focus moving forward is new books and games, including the spiritual successor to this game, Sunny's Summer Vacation - currently in development. Bug fixes may occur as needed, and updates shouldn't disrupt save data.

I hope you enjoy my beloved creation that took far too long to get published.

Shine bright!
